title: The In-Betweener
description: Two years ago a new medical nanite advance divided humanity into three types: humans, deaders and the frightening in-betweeners who crave human flesh. Emily's world has grown quiet and ordered, her day bounded by mornings killing deaders at her fence and nights alone in a warehouse office. She's begun to believe life will always be this way, days alone with the dead or fighting in-betweeners for her life. But even that life is better than the alternative. Everything changes when one of the deaders at the gate isn't a deader at all. Heâ€™s an in-betweener different from any Emily has seen before...and he has a message. The Between Life and Death series is suitable for ages 16 and up, with occasional violence and mild language.
author: Ann Christy
